text:
League 1
Brest - PSG: Dall'Oglio calls for "a collective state of mind"!
A 2 days to face the PSG, Brest coach gave a press conference on what he expects of his players to hope to worry Parisians.
07 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Charlie Creteur



The promoted of this season 2019-2020 of Ligue 1, was rather active during this summer transfer window. Discover all the recruits of the 2019 mercato of Brest! Icon Sport



Romain Perraud2M ‚Ç¨ OGC NiceIcon Sport



Alexandre MendyR√™tBordeauxIcon Sport



Paul LasneLibreMontpellierIcon Sport



Samuel GrandsirPr√™tAS MonacoIcon Sport



Jean-Kevin Duverne2M ‚Ç¨ RC LensIcon Sport



Ibrahima Diallo2M ‚Ç¨ AS MonacoIcon Sport



Irvin Cardona ‚Ç¨ 1.50M AS MonacoIcon Sport



Denys BainLibreLe HavreIcon Sport



Ludovic BaalLibreRennesIcon Sport

Brest: all recruits of the transfer window 2019




In front of Dijon (1-2 defeat) and Bruges (1-0 defeat), Paris Saint-Germain showed a different face, easy, imprecise, sometimes little involved. In a press conference, the future opponent of Thomas Tuchel in Ligue 1 Olivier Dall'Olglio, does not really believe in a form of PSG. "If this team does not deconcentrate, if it does not demobilize, it is above," said coach Brest. "And I do not think she's in doubt, maybe she showed a little ease and relaxation and Dijon was successful."







"A great collective state of mind"




Opa Nguette + 10 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

However, the Brest coach does not expect to come for a defeat and surrendered on his desires to hope for a good performance. "You have to have a big defensive block and a guard in a state of grace," he said. "And a great collective state of mind, but it will also show arguments to keep the ball and try to hurt them when we can, not to mention the kicks set [..] We may be changing the warm-ups ". At home, Brest can he create the feat? Answer, Saturday at 17:30!
